welcome_message_body: Welcome to Plano, where southern charm meets modern innovation. Explore our vibrant downtown, renowned for its shopping, dining, and lively cultural scene, and get ready to enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Casey's General Store
restaurants.description: Casey's General Store is a pizzeria located in Plano.
restaurants.address: 411 W South St (E. North), Plano, IL 60545

restaurants.name: Culver's
restaurants.description: Culver's is a fast food restaurant located in Plano.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Plano.
restaurants.address: 111 E South St (at Center St.), Plano, IL 60545

restaurants.name: Jade's Garden
restaurants.description: Jade's Garden is a chinese restaurant located in Plano.

restaurants.name: Tako Chido
restaurants.description: Tako Chido is a mexican restaurant located in Plano.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at DFW, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal with a focus on domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serving both domestic and international flights, this terminal is known for its modern design and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal at DFW, featuring a wide range of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A smaller terminal with a focus on regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DFW, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, with the option to upgrade to a faster connection for a fee.
